content: this is a free pattern available on my blog winter is upon us and i couldn t think of a better little mascot than this cute and cuddly penguin he is made from soft chunky yarn which makes him extra squishy and fun to make complete with rosy cheeks and a colorful scarf this penguin can be kept out all winter long this penguin is super quick to whip up and includes step by step photos to help you along as you make it pattern difficulty beginner/intermediate pattern is written in english with us crochet terminology materials needed level 6 super bulky yarn size 7mm crochet hook 9mm plastic safety eyes polyester fiberfill stuffing pink felt hot glue gun stitch maker yarn needle scissors straight pins skills needed magic_ring single_crochet increase invisible decrease chain half_double_crochet double_crochet crocheting in the back loops only finished measurement 5 5 inches wide and 5 inches tall
